name: aza/math
description: AzaMath - Anizoptera CMF mathematic component. Provides functionality to work with large numbers with arbitrary precision (using BCMath) and universal convertor between numeral systems (supported bases from 2 to 62 inclusive, and custom systems; pure PHP realisation, but can use GMP and core PHP functions for speed optimization).

suggest.ext-bcmath: Install the BCMath (Binary Calculator Arbitrary Precision Mathematics) extension to work with arbitrary precision arithmetic operations.
suggest.ext-gmp: Install the GMP (GNU Multiple Precision) extension in order to speed up number systems conversions and (in future) arbitrary precision arithmetic operations.
